alert.note: Alert for Humboldt; Lander (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 31 at 5:40PM PDT until further notice by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Nevada, northeast Nevada and northwest Nevada, including the following counties, in north central Nevada, Lander. In northeast Nevada, Elko. In northwest Nevada, Humboldt. * WHEN...Until 1045 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 540 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.0 and 2.0 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.4 to 0.8 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Midas, Midas Mine and Twin Creeks Mine. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
